text: Olivia Luccardi (born May 17, 1989)https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3459140/ is an American actress and producer. She is best known for her roles as Alice Woods in Syfy's horror anthology series Channel Zero: Butcher's Block and as Yara Davis in the supernatural thriller film It Follows. Luccardi’s other notable roles include the american thriller film Money Monster, the independent comedy drama film Person to Person, Netflix's comedy-drama series Orange Is the New Black, and HBO's period drama series The Deuce. ==Filmography== === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
